languages.text:
{n}Ксенос, склонив голову набок, с любопытством оглядывает Кассию:{/n}
"Три ока могут многое прозреть:
Ша'эиль тропы, закрома души,
Но даже сотне взоров не сыскать
Обломки судеб, на твоей изнанке!
И ветхий вальс былого закружит
Тебя в чертогах спутанного рока,
Но не сейчас — для танца нужно двое,
А твой партнер мной занят до поры".

{n}The xenos, tilting his head to the side, looks at Cassia with curiosity.{/n}
"So many things can three eyes glimpse at once:
Sha'eil's veiled paths and caverns of the soul,
But with a thousand sights you could not see
The wrecks of fate beneath reality!
Past's creaking waltz will twirl you round in halls
of intertwining serendipity,
But not just yet — the dance calls for a pair,
Your partner is, for now, tied up with me."

languages.text:
{n}異種族たちは首を横にかしげ、好奇の目でカシアを見る。{/n}
「3つの目には瞬時に映るさまざまな物事。
シャーエイルの秘されし道、その魂を封じる大洞窟。
しかし千の視界でをもってしても見えず
現実に支配された破壊の運命は！
過去のきしむワルツは絡み合うセレンディピティの広間にてあなたでくるくる円を描く、
しかし今はその時にあらず…ダンスにはペアが必要、
あなたの相手は、当面、私に縛られている」
languages.original_text:
{n}The xenos, tilting his head to the side, looks at Cassia with curiosity.{/n}
"So many things can three eyes glimpse at once:
Sha'eil's veiled paths and caverns of the soul,

traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
{n}丑角将头歪到一边，好奇地看着卡西娅。{/n}
“三眼一瞥，世界尽收眼底。
纱芮尔隐秘的道路，灵魂深处的罅隙。
可纵使你遍览千般景象，亦无法窥见，
命运隐匿于现实之中的真意！
过去的乐章，引领你在纠缠的机缘中翩然起舞，
可时机尚未成熟，因为舞伴不可缺一，
而你命定的伴侣，此刻正与我缠绵未已。”
languages.original_text:
{n}The xenos, tilting his head to the side, looks at Cassia with curiosity.{/n}
"So many things can three eyes glimpse at once:
Sha'eil's veiled paths and caverns of the soul,

of intertwining serendipity,
But not just yet — the dance calls for a pair,
Your partner is, for now, tied up with me."

traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
{n}Penchant la tête, le xénos examine Cassia avec curiosité.{/n}
« Nombreuses sont les choses que trois yeux peuvent voir :
Des cavernes de l'âme aux chemins voilés du Sha'eil,
Mais même un millier d'iris ne peuvent percer la nuit noire,
Où les épaves du destin, la réalité balaye.
La valse du passé vous fera tourner au bal de l'imprévu,
Mais vous devrez pour cela attendre votre cavalier,
Dont l'heure de la libération n'est pas encore venue,
Et qui aujourd'hui encore à ma volonté est lié. »
languages.original_text:
{n}The xenos, tilting his head to the side, looks at Cassia with curiosity.{/n}
"So many things can three eyes glimpse at once:
Sha'eil's veiled paths and caverns of the soul,

Past's creaking waltz will twirl you round in halls
of intertwining serendipity,
But not just yet — the dance calls for a pair,
Your partner is, for now, tied up with me."

Dont l'heure de la libération n'est pas encore venue,
Et qui aujourd'hui encore à ma volonté est lié. »
traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
{n}El xenos ladea la cabeza y mira a Cassia con curiosidad.{/n}
«Tres ojos pueden vislumbrar mucho a la vez,
como los caminos velados de Sha'eil o las cavernas del alma,
mas ¡ni con mil miradas podrías ver
los restos del destino que subyacen en la realidad!
El vals chirriante del pasado te hará girar en salones
de serendipia entrelazada,
mas no todavía, pues el baile requiere una pareja.
La tuya está, de momento, atada a mí».
languages.original_text:
{n}The xenos, tilting his head to the side, looks at Cassia with curiosity.{/n}
"So many things can three eyes glimpse at once:
Sha'eil's veiled paths and caverns of the soul,

traits.speaker: Zanni_GrandSpectacle

languages.text:
{n}Der Xenos legt den Kopf zur Seite und mustert Cassia neugierig.{/n}
"So viele Dinge drei Augen sehen:
Sha'eils Pfade und Höhlen der Seele,
Doch mit tausend Blicken, die Ihr nicht saht.
Des Schicksals Wracks fern der Realität!
Gestriger Walzer dreht Euch in Hallen
aus einem Netz glücklicher Fügungen.
Allein der Tanz verlangt nach einem Paar,
Doch Euer Partner ist mit mir verbunden."
languages.original_text:
{n}The xenos, tilting his head to the side, looks at Cassia with curiosity.{/n}

languages.text:
{n}Zeno, başını yana eğerek merakla Cassia'ya bakıyor.{/n}
"Üç gözün bakışları, tek seferde nicelerine ulaşır,
Sha'eil'in örtülü yolları ve ruh mağaralarında dolaşır.
Lakin bin kere baksan bile göremezsin
Hakikatin ardında yatan enkazını kaderinin!
Mutlu tesadüflerin sarmaş dolaş dans ettiği salonlarda
Dönüp duracaksın geçmişin gıcırtılı valsinin son adımında.
Lakin henüz değil, dansta sana bir eş gerek,
Eşinin kaderi ise şimdilik bana bağlı olsa gerek."
languages.original_text:
